---
title: "Shipboard UCTD System"
editor: visual
---

We have used several UCTD systems on NOAA Ships. The most recent system is the [Valeport rapidPro UCTD](https://www.valeport.co.uk/products/rapidpro-svt/).

![](images/clipboard-1300689794.png){width="499"}

[Operating Instructions for Valeport UCTD](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1id6BKzOnGaiIXUzBsbpGF7rn54h-Gky2Ws3Y4HaVMUk/edit?tab=t.0) - charging, cast methods, data download.

Operating Manuals and set up files can be found on the [UCTD Google Drive Folder](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1HNvgLVGcTItjX1VedqBfNyO5nVk_3XKW?usp=drive_link).
